view.title: Configure default pricing rules
view.subtitle: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

blocks.title: Owner Configure Pricing completed
blocks.message: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

resultPayload.note: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

requestBody.title: Customer one signs up and logs in API Trace

data.instruction: Invite a biz member, assign an operational role, and verify that member can authenticate into the same biz.
data.expectedResult: Biz member account/session exists with scoped role permissions.

data.instruction: Create baseline availability and lead-time rules representing the UC default business hours and booking window behavior.
data.expectedResult: Availability defaults and rules are stored and can be referenced by calendars.

data.instruction: Create at least one host resource and one non-host resource (asset or venue) suitable for the UC.
data.expectedResult: Resources are created with expected type, location, and buffers.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Peer-to-Peer Equipment Rental (Fat Llama Style). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.

data.instruction: Create a published offer version with realistic duration and base price for this UC.
data.expectedResult: Offer version exists and is ready for booking order references.

data.title: Owner creates business tenant Snapshot
